attributes.action: Build more council housing and look after your own people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: build more council houses (waiting list in aberdeen is 4000 and rising), i've been on the list for nearly 3 years and the polish seem to get housed within 3 weeks. LOOK AFTER YOUR OWN PEOPLE MR BROWN

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
